param.name: download_frequency_duration
param.displayname: Download frequency-duration data? If yes, define freqency and duration below.
param.dialogReference:
If you choose to use a locally stored copy of the frequency-duration raster, you must use a specific file downloaded from the Precipitation Hydrometeorological Design Studies Center. To do so, you must use and FTP manager such as Windows Explorer or Mozilla Filezilla. The FTP directory to download your file from is:

ftp://hdsc.nws.noaa.gov/pub/hdsc/data/mw/

Within that directory, find the frequency-duration raster you desire using the following file template:

mw[f]yr[d]ha.zip

where [f] and [d] are your frequency and duration, respectively. For example, for a 10-yr 24-hr rainfall event, download:

mw10yr24ha.zip.

param.dialogReference:
